source.en: Blaser, Magdalena "Myths of the Cofán people"

values.value: At the beginning, God created land.
Realment Dios primero creó la tierra.

sentences.text: Tsa'caen andema tayo agattoemba tse'i tsu a'iveja agattoen.

values.value: After creating land, He then created man.

sentences.text: Andema tisia'can'me ñoñaccoemba tsanga ufapa ttova ccutsiansi a'ive da.

values.value: He blew and threw the land and it rose to become a person.

sentences.text: Tsa'caen a'ive agattoemba Uttetsuma manda cuintsu ccoimpa in'gaye tte'ttove ñoñañe.

values.value: Having created man, He ordered the curassow to bring him flint in order to make man teeth.
Habiendo creado al hombre mandó a Paujil: "Tráigame un pedernal para hacerle los dientes."

sentences.text: Tsama mandasi inga'su japa uta jimbi.
Faesu a'i Tuntun qque inise'cho tse'tti can ccutsu.
Tsonsi ju qquen su tinga buttoin japa junde tteccupajema isutinga ji.
Tsonsi su: ¿Ya tseti qui isutinga ji?
Queta qui tuntuan'caen buttoin japa tse'fai'ccuyi buttocatsesi.
Tsa'caen susi tuntume dapa tsampini canseye ja.
Tsa'caen tsonsi tsu Chigaja ingi tte'ttoveja ñoña tteccupajema.
Tsa'ma uttetsuja vasia've japa vasia've tise manda'choma ta'etssia'ma isi tise'majan su:
Queta qui uttetsia'caen vasia've jacan'supa vasia've in'gapa ji.
Tsa'caen susi uttetsuve dapa tsampini ja tsangae canseye.
Tsa'caen uttetsu jasi tsa uttetsu i'cho ñotssia'ma saquirambe toya'caen aimbe tte'ttove ñoñamba afe.
Tsomba a'imbe toya'caen ttesimbeja tteccupajema ñoñamba afe.
